Meteara: Wait Firaxis. Let us not barge in. The sphere is not in 
danger yet. Let them club each others senseless.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Meteara's at the North Pole, no tlikely to just happen up there 
and 
> notice her, especially since she's with Firaxis.
> 
> ::Firaxis::
>        He nods solemnly at Meteara, "Then we should go quickly."  He 
> transforms into his bird mode and Horn transforms into his rocket 
sled mode 
> and they fly towards the battle.
